text: Jan Thilo Kehrer (; born 21 September 1996) is a German professional footballer who plays as a defender for Ligue 1 club Monaco and the Germany national team. Mainly a centre-back, he can also play in either full-back position. == References == Category:1996 births Category:German footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Sportspeople from Baden- Württemberg Category:People from Tübingen Category:Living people Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players
title: Thilo Kehrer
